title: FCC Withdraws Telecom Cybersecurity Mandates After Salt Typhoon Hack
author: Elijah White
excerpt: The FCC voted to revoke telecom cybersecurity rules after the Salt Typhoon attack. Telecoms agreed to implement voluntary safeguards while some lawmakers criticized the rollback.

title: Welcome to My Cyber Blog
preview: This is my first post, introducing my cybersecurity blog...
